column4: hi, i wanted to create some tutorial, i use gtk-recordmydesktop, i have a headphone with microphone on it, how do i record my voice in the tutorial?
rooly:are there any sound recorder apps in hardy, how do i do that?

you could record the video first then use audacity to record the voiceover while watching it later,even if the desktop recorder can record voice to the video you'll have more time to think about your commentary
sudo apt-get install audacity first, i suspect
